# batisdl
For downloading OECD BATIS data using API, excluding reporter country from counterpart list.

# R:

```r
install.packages("remotes")  # if needed
remotes::install_github("cmbzamora/batisdl")
library(batisdl)

key <- "AUS._F+SCG_F+W+WXD.M+X..SC1+SDA+SI1+SJ1+SK1+SC2+SDB+SI2+SJ2+SK2+SC3+SI3+SJ3+SC4+SA+SB+SC+SD+SE+SF+SG+SH+SI+SJ+SK+SL+SOX+SOX1+SPX1+SPX4+S.A.USD_EXC.B"  # paste from OECD site, see Data Query block in Developer API section and update as needed.
batis_download(
  reporter_code = "FRA",
  start_year    = 2017,
  end_year      = 2023,
  output_dir    = "/path/to/out",
  key_from_site = key  #<- DO NOT CHANGE
)
```
